title: Shadow of Aether: A Paradox Novella
description: Paradox is known throughout the sprawling metropolis of Aether for three her superspeed; her ability to see visions of the past, present and future and her brutal sarcasm.When she has a vision that shows her a mysterious force taking over and corrupting her homeland, she decides to take matters into her own hands.During the mission, she comes across another person who changes everything.Now, Paradox must do whatever she can to put things back to normal.'Shadow of Aether' is a young adult, science fantasy story set within the fictional world of Orbis. The main race of Orbis are known as the Unitas and they possess both magic and incredible technology.'Shadow of Aether' is the first book in a series about alternate dimensions, parallel worlds and the people who can travel between them. Perfect for fans of science fiction and fantasy stories.Parental This book contains explicit language, violence and sexual references.
author: Adam Leggett
